arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Burnley – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United are aiming for back-to-back Premier League wins for the first time since February. They host Burnley today in a crucial battle at the foot of the table. This match pits the Hammers, who sit 18th, against a Burnley side just one place above them.
